content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DisableRule path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/rules/{rule_id}/disable content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name ruleid
desc a waf rule id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum disable a rule
responses
title: 22_Rules_DisableRule_122.json
